::KitKat::

She stood up as the foxbot came out of the room. She smiled. She took 
a few steps closer to him. "Very well, follow." She turned and 
motioned with her foreleg, for him to come along. Her clone stood 
there.  It followed behind FoxFinger. KitKat smiled at the fox. "Now 
then, why did you break in here? But I must give you credit, you are 
a good burgler. You burgle well."  She tried to put her paw on his 
shoulder. "You know, if you ever decide to you want some action, or 
just a change of pace, please stop by again." She just barely touched 
his shoulder. She pulled her paw away, but left a very tiny tracking 
device on his shoulder.

She made it to the entrance. She stopped at the door and smiled at at 
him. "Well, you take care. As I said, if you ever change your mind, 
stop by here."

She turned and went back to the conference room where Koj and Inu 
were at. She tranceformed into bot mode. "Forgive me. Things are just 
getting busy I'm afraid. Now gentlebots, what is it that I can do for 
you?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Foxfingers stepped out in the open cautiously keeping his hand on 
the button
> to make his act look real. "One Maximal life against at least four
> Predacons? sounds liker a victory for my side. You say I'm free to 
go? Prove
> it, lead the way out, I'll follow." He had heard enough bravado 
from the
> Predacon shedog.
